Information.noAnswer: Didn't find an answer to your question?
Information.personal: I agree to the terms of the user agreement and privacy policy

PersonalInfo.11: 1.1. This User Agreement (hereinafter referred to as the agreement) governs the relationship between the owner of the game 'Bot Lesya' (hereinafter referred to as the bot, site) with the user.
PersonalInfo.12: 1.2. By using the bot, you agree to the terms of this agreement.
PersonalInfo.2: 2. Rights and obligations of the parties
PersonalInfo.21: 2.1. Administratsiya obyazuyetsya podderzhivat' rabotosposobnost' sayta i bota za isklyucheniyem sluchayev, kogda eto nevozmozhno po nezavisyashchim ot Administratsii prichinam. The Administration undertakes to maintain the site and the bot in working order, except when it is impossible for reasons beyond the control of the Administration.
PersonalInfo.22: 2.2. The administration guarantees the free use of the bot and the site.
PersonalInfo.23: 2.3. The administration has the right to: delete and change accounts; create, modify and delete rules and information; carry out technical work on the bot and the site at any time.
PersonalInfo.24: 2.4. The user agrees to be bound by this agreement
PersonalInfo.25: 2.5. The user undertakes not to disrupt the performance of the bot and the site.
PersonalInfo.26: 2.6. The user undertakes not to use scripts, programs for automated interaction with the site and the bot.
PersonalInfo.31: 3.1. The user voluntarily makes donations to the bot with real money.
PersonalInfo.32: 3.2. Donations are non-refundable and/or transferable to another game account.
PersonalInfo.33: 3.3. The reward is issued within 24 hours (usually immediately) after the donation is made.
PersonalInfo.41: 4.1. This agreement comes into force with any use of the site and / or bot.
PersonalInfo.42: 4.2. The administration reserves the right to unilaterally change this agreement at its discretion.

BotProtect.higtText: Check what you wrote to the bot

BlockModal.descBan: Insulting a member of the administration team in a particularly harsh manner
